: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw saw Battera comeing at him. He extends his claws and swings at Battera's wings, trying to slice right through it.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She had transformed into wolf mode and ran out of the base. She ran 
hard and made her way to the battle field. She transformed into bot 
mode and drew her plasma pistol. She raised it as started shooting 
Windlord."Die Bot!"


Battera::

She swooped down and went to hit SharpClaw with her huge bat 
wing. "Take that you vile creature. May the matrix have great pity on 
your spark!"
